org.deidentifier.arx.masking

Class Random

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomAdaptor
        • org.deidentifier.arx.masking.Random
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator

    public final class Random
extends org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomAdaptor
    Provides quick access to an alternative random number generator used instead of the standard RNG Random, because of its limitations. A superior RNG from the Apache Commons Math library is used in its place.

    The class inherits from RandomAdaptor, a wrapper for RandomGenerators so they can be used instead of a Random.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Random()
      Creates a new RNG object using the Well44497b RNG.

      • Random

        public Random()
